about.title: About Us
about.mission: At Lighthouse Books, we believe that great stories know no borders. Our mission is to bring multilingual and bilingual editions to readers around the world, fostering understanding and appreciation across cultures.
about.story: Founded by passionate linguists and book lovers, Lighthouse Books emerged from a simple idea: that the joy of reading should be accessible in multiple languages. We carefully curate and publish editions that honor the original works while making them accessible to new audiences.
